title: What Would You Do/Am I The A**hole: Charging Your Guests to Attend Your Wedding
itunes:title: What Would You Do/Am I The A**hole: Charging Your Guests to Attend Your Wedding
itunes:subtitle: Tacky or simply a move away from a traditional wedding model?
description:
This week, the Basic and the Brain drop a new segment called "What would you do/Am I the asshole?". This week we talk about a recent reddit post where a bride charged each quest $75 for their dinner plate at her wedding, and people are saying it's actually becoming a common thing. We discuss the nuances of this particular case, bring up several similar personal situations and discuss whether it's tacky or simply moving away from typical "wedding tradition".


Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
